channel.title: Donator Help
channel.description: Hi i have donator status in my server but when you talk it doesnt do anything or when you do ::yell and i was wanting it to say [Donator]playername: and then whatever he says and when he talks normally in chat i want it to show a donor symbol for it. is there a tut i can use or can anyone help me?

item.title: Donator Help
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

First, find the exact wording for donator. I’m assuming it’s just “donator”.

For the yell command you could use this:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
String message = command.substring(4);

if ((donator == 1) && playerRights == 0)) { // I’m assuming mod’s will want theirs to say MOD not DONATOR
yell("[DONATOR] " + playerName + “: “+message+””);
}
if ((playerRights == 1)) {
yell("[MOD] " + playerName + “: “+message+””);
} if ((playerRights == 2)) {
yell("[ADMIN] " + playerName + “: “+message+””);
} if ((playerRights == 3)) {
yell("[OWNER] " + playerName + “: “+message+””);
} if ((playerRights == 0)) {
yell("" + playerName + " - “+message+”");
}
}[/code]

Read full topic
